titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Orange County Historical Project Collection LSC.0215

p.date: Online finding aid last updated 2020 December 23.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-08-16 14:56:39 -0700.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United States. Works Progress Administration. California

did.physloc: Stored off-site. All requests to access special collections material must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. All requests to access special collections materials must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of receipt unknown.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Potentially Offensive Description in Library Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Orange County historical project collection (Collection 215). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Reproduction and Use
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical objects belong to UCLA Library Special Collections. All other rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.
